Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if elemType != "Class" and elemType != "Interface" and elemType != "Enumeration"% %endTemplate%
%elemType% { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Class")% %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("language")% language="Java" %list="ClassParameter" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="ClassBase" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="ClassInterface" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %list="InnerClass" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %if elemType!="Interface"% %list="Attribute" @separator="
" @indent=" "% %endIf% %list="Attribute__AsProperties" @separator="
" @indent=" " attScope=="Public"% %list="Operation" @separator="
" @indent=" "% } %list="Connector" @separator="
"%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="Convert SQL type to JAVA type" $COMMENT="Convert the SQL type of Postgres to the corresponding JAVA type"
$varType = $parameter1
%if $varType == ""% $ParamType = "int" %elseIf $varType == "bigint"% $ParamType = "long" %elseIf $varType == "varchar"% $ParamType = "String" %elseIf $varType == "decimal"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "double precision"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "integer"% $ParamType = "int" %else% $ParamType = $varType %endIf% $ParamType

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$attName=$parameter1 $type=%ConvertSqlType($parameter2)% $propertyName=$attName $propertyName=%REMOVE_PREFIX($propertyName,genOptPropertyPrefix)% $propertyName=%CONVERT_NAME($propertyName, "pascal case", "camel case")% $propertyName=%CONVERT_NAME($propertyName, "HT()HT", "Ht()ht")% %if genOptGenCapitalisedProperties=="T"% $propertyName4=%CONVERT_NAME($propertyName, "camel case", "pascal case")% %endIf% Operation { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE()% name=%qt%%genOptJavaGetPrefix%$propertyName%qt% stereotype="property get" scope="Public" type=%qt%$type%qt% code=%qt%return $attName;%qt% Tag{name="attribute_name" value=%qt%$attName%qt%} %if $propertyName=="uuid"% Tag{name="annotations" value="@Id"} %endIf% }
Operation { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE()% name=%qt%%genOptJavaSetPrefix%$propertyName%qt% stereotype="property set" scope="Public" type="void" Parameter { name="newVal" type=%qt%$type%qt% } code=%qt%$attName = newVal;%qt% Tag{name="attribute_name" value=%qt%$attName%qt%} }

Column.name: Template
Column.value: $type=%CONVERT_TYPE("Java",attType)% Attribute { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE()% %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("scope","type","stereotype")% scope=%qt%%attScope == "Public" ? "Private" : value%%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_TYPE("Java",attType)%%qt% type=%qt%%ConvertSqlType($type)%%qt% %if classStereotype=="enumeration"% stereotype="enum" %else% stereotype=%qt%%attStereotype%%qt% %endIf% }
